靴ばこ: (くつばこ) - shoe box; shoe shelf
靴ひもを結ぶ: (くつひもをむすぶ) - to do up one's shoelaces; to tie one's shoes; to lace up one's shoes
靴を揃える: (くつをそろえる) - to arrange (one's) shoes (e.g. in a genkan)
靴を磨く: (くつをみがく) - to polish one's shoes; to clean your shoes
靴一足: (くついっそく) - pair of shoes
靴型: (くつがた) - shoe last; shoe stretcher
靴帯: (かたい) - ankle strap (for fastening a shoe)
靴摺り: (くつずり) - door sill; threshold plate
靴箱: (くつばこ) - shoe box; shoe shelf
靴紐を結ぶ: (くつひもをむすぶ) - to do up one's shoelaces; to tie one's shoes; to lace up one's shoes
靴脱ぎ: (くつぬぎ) - place where one can remove one's shoes before entering a house
靴足袋: (くつたび) - socks; var. of tabi
靴跡: (くつあと) - shoe mark; shoe print
靺鞨: (まつかつ) - Mohe (one of the Tungusic-speaking tribes)
鞄: (はく) - Mala, bolsa, pasta, maleta, cesto
鞄持: (かばんもち) - private secretary; flunky/someone who is always following around someone of high rank; someone who carries a bag for someone/luggage carrier/carrying a bag
鞄持ち: (かばんもち) - private secretary; flunky/someone who is always following around someone of high rank; someone who carries a bag for someone/luggage carrier/carrying a bag
鞄語: (かばんご) - portmanteau word; combination of two words (often first half of one, second half of another)
鞆: (とも) - Protetor de Braço do Arqueiro, protetor de pulso esquerdo do arqueiro
鞍上: (あんじょう) - on top of a saddle
鞍上人なく鞍下馬なし: (あんじょうひとなくあんかうまなし) - riding a horse so skillfully that it appears as if man and horse have become one
鞍上人無く鞍下馬無し: (あんじょうひとなくあんかうまなし) - riding a horse so skillfully that it appears as if man and horse have become one
鞍掛海豹: (クラカケアザラシ) - ribbon seal (Histriophoca fasciata)
鞍掛紋殻: (クラカケモンガラ) - blackbelly triggerfish (Rhinecanthus verrucosus)
鞍替え: (くらがえ) - changing one's stance/changing loyalties/changing jobs/switching horses; changing business location/changing houses/changing quarters
鞍馬: (あんば) - pommel horse/side horse; saddled horse
鞏固: (きょうこ) - firmness; stability; security; strength
鞘: (しょう) - Sheath , scabbard, sheath; cap (em caneta, pincel, etc.), case, sleeve; margin (between two prices), spread, markup, commission; enclosure, outer fence
鞘を払う: (さやをはらう) - to draw a sword
鞘味泥: (サヤミドロ) - oedogonium (any of a genus of filamentous green algae)
鞘尻: (さやじり) - tip of a scabbard
鞘当て: (さやあて) - rivalry for the heart of a woman; (from two samurai quarreling because the sheaths of their swords happened to touch) quarrel over something trivial
鞘走る: (さやばしる) - to slip out of one's scabbard (of swords)
鞠: (きく) - Ball , ball (para esportes, jogos, etc.); kemari, type of football played by courtiers in ancient Japan
鞠躬如: (きくきゅうじょ) - deferential; humble; reverent; respectful
鞣し革: (なめしがわ) - leather/tanned animal hide/suede; kanji "tanned leather" radical (radical 178)
鞣皮: (なめしがわ) - leather/tanned animal hide/suede; kanji "tanned leather" radical (radical 178)
鞣革: (なめしがわ) - leather/tanned animal hide/suede; kanji "tanned leather" radical (radical 178)
鞦韆: (ブランコ) - (poss. from Por: balanço) swing; trapeze
鞨鼓: (かっこ) - {music} kakko; Japanese hourglass drum, played with sticks on both sides, traditionally used in gagaku
鞭: (べん) - Chicote, chicote, ameaça, flagelo; vara, bastão, cana, ponteiro
鞭ち: (むちうち) - whipping/beating with a whip; whiplash
鞭入れ: (むちいれ) - whipping (horse racing); using the whip
鞭打ち: (むちうち) - whipping/beating with a whip; whiplash
鞭打つ: (むちうつ) - to whip; to lash; to give the rod; to spur on; to encourage
鞭撻: (べんたつ) - encouragement/enthusiasm/urging; chastising by whipping
